subject: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attention: Sir/Madam,
My name is Yemi Cardoso.  I am the new  governor of Central Bank of Nigeria.  While going through beneficiaries'/contractors' files yesterday, I came across your own file and discovered that the major reason why you have not received your fund for the past years is because you are not the real contractor who executed this contract.  And if you continue to fight to receive this fund it will be impossible for you to get it.
Based on that fact, I want you and I to strike a deal so that if you are ready to receive the fund, I will guide you on the necessary things to be done so that you will receive this fund.  If you keep trying on your own to claim this fund they will need you to get the vital documents from the original contractor that backs up this fund.  But I want to make it much easier for you if you can accept to work with me so that I will make it possible for you to receive this fund.
The total amount in question is USD$26.5M.  So if you are ready to work with me, I need you to provide your full information to me such as your full names, address, phone and any of your identification card.  On receipt of those information from you, I will tell you the next step.
Please you should be informed that I will provide all the necessary documents that will back up this fund so that after you receive this fund there will be no agency that will question you about the source of this fund.  I also want to ask you if you can be able to come down here to sign all those documents.  But if you know you cannot be able to come down here to sign the documents, a competent lawyer here will sign  those documents on your behalf and the lawyer will charge the sum of $250 for him to sign those documents for you which you will be the person to pay this fee because you will be required to send a copy of the receipt of payment of this $250.  That is the only fee you will pay and nothing again to pay before you receive this fund.
Please note that this is a deal between you and I and I want you to cooperate with me.
Please you should reply this to this email address: 
yemicardoso14@gmail.com
You can also call me on the phone number: +234-9165637153.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Yemi Cardoso,
New Central Bank Governor,
E-mail: 
yemicardoso14@gmail.com
.

subject: Re:   Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Yemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing. However, I'm a bit confused about some details. You mentioned that the major reason why I haven't received my fund is because I'm not the real contractor who executed this contract. Could you please elaborate on this? 

Also, you mentioned a total amount in question but didn't specify the exact figure. How much are we talking about here? 

I appreciate your offer to guide me through the necessary steps to receive this fund and provide all necessary documents. But before we proceed further, could you please explain more about these documents and what they represent?

As for coming down there to sign the documents, currently due to certain circumstances it might be difficult for me to travel. However, if it's absolutely necessary then I'll consider it.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn: Lela,

The reason why I said that is because, it was someone who executed  a
contract here and used your name as the Next Of Kin to the fund.  I
did not mean you are not part of the fund.  No, that is not what I
actually mean.  You are the next of kin to this fund.

So this should not get you confused any further.  Before we proceed I
need you to provide me with your full information such as your full
names, address, phone and any form of your identification card.

On receipt of those information from you I will tell you the next step.

Yemi

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for your message and the clarification. It's quite surprising to hear that someone used my name as the Next Of Kin for a fund. I'm curious, how did this happen? And what does being a Next Of Kin entail?

I'm sorry but I can't provide my full details at this moment. However, I'd love to learn more about this situation. Could you please explain further?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn:: Leilla,

I confirm receipt of your email and its contents were noted and
understood.  Since you cannot be able to come and sign those documents
a lawyer here will do the signing  on your behalf and it will cost you
the sum of $350 for the lawyer to do the signing on your behalf.

i wait to hear from you

Yemi

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's interesting to know that a lawyer can sign the documents on my behalf. 

Could you please provide more details about this process? How does it work exactly? And how is it possible for someone else to sign on my behalf?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn  Leila,

Due to the distance and your inability to come over here and the cost
of flight to come and sign the documents originally as required to do
so.  So a lawyer here will do the signing on your behalf and after the
signing the fund will be transferred into your preferred bank account.

So if you send that fee the lawyer will go ahead and sign the
documents and after that I will transfer the fund into your preferred
bank account.

i wait to hear from you.

Yemi

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for your message. It's quite interesting to hear about this process. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions. Could you please explain a bit more about how it works? 

For instance, who is this lawyer and how can they sign on my behalf? Also, could you provide more details about the fee that needs to be sent? How much is it and what exactly is it for?

I appreciate your patience in explaining these things to me.

Best wishes,
Leila

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Attn: Leila,

Before I explain further I need your full information such as your
full names, address, phone and any form of your identification card.

Can you come down here to sign those documents that will back up this
fund.  But if  you cannot come here to sign those documents you will
have to send the sum of $350 so that a lawyer here will sign the
document on your behalf and after the signing by the lawyer I will
surely make that fund transfer without any further delay.

Waiting to hear from you.

Yemi

subject: Re: Attention: Sir/Madam,
body:
Hello Yemi,

Thank you for your message. It sounds like an interesting proposition, but I'm a bit confused about some details. Could you please explain more about these documents that need to be signed? What exactly are they for?

Also, I'm curious about the role of the lawyer in this process. How does their signing on my behalf work? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Leila
